thread.title: French air traffic control strike called off
thread.title_full: French air traffic control strike called off

title: French air traffic control strike called off
text:
French air traffic control strike called off 2 July 2015 Save 
A threatened strike for today and tomorrow by French air traffic controllers has been called off at the 11 th hour. 
Members of the SNCTA and Force Ouvriere unions, which between them represent more than 50% of air-traffic controllers, had been due to walk out for two days in a row over pay. 
Only yesterday the French media was reporting that the talks had collapsed and the strikes were due to start this morning. 
However, following new talks the strike has been called off with airlines, including British Airways, no longer expecting industrial-action related problems over French skies today or tomorrow.
